Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.view

Class RemoteView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.observer.Observable<ViewObserver>
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.view.RemoteView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelObserver
public class RemoteView
extends View
Turns client input into commands for the controller to apply changes to the model

  • Constructor Details

    • RemoteView

      public RemoteView​(Player player, ClientConnectionHandler connection)

      The RemoteView will convert every received packet into commands for the controller to apply changes to the model, and will convert any receiving model information into packets to send to the client.

      Parameters:
      player - associated with the current view
      connection - channel where packets are transparently sent and received from

  • Method Details

    • notifyError

      public void notifyError​(java.lang.String error)
      Called when an error has to be notified

      Sends a packet a String notification error

      Specified by:
      notifyError in class View
      Parameters:
      error - String with the error

    • playerPlaceWorker

      public void playerPlaceWorker​(Player player, Worker worker)
      Called when a player places a worker on the map

      Sends a packet with action data

      Parameters:
      player - the player making the move
      worker - the worker that has been placed

    • playerMove

      public void playerMove​(Player player, Worker worker, Point from, Point where)
      Called when a player moves a worker in the game

      Sends a packet with action data

      Parameters:
      player - the player making the move
      worker - the worker that actually does move
      from - old position
      where - new position

    • playerBuild

      public void playerBuild​(Player player, Worker worker, Point where, boolean forceDome)
      Called when a player builds with a worker in the game

      Sends a packet with action data

      Parameters:
      player - the player making the build
      worker - the worker that actually does build
      where - the position where the block is positioned
      forceDome - if player has forced dome build

    • playerUpdate

      public void playerUpdate​(Game game, Player player)
      Called on a generic player update

      Sends a packet with updated player status

      Parameters:
      game - current game object
      player - that has his status updated

    • playerEndTurn

      public void playerEndTurn​(Game game, Player player)
      Called on a player turn end

      Sends a packet with updated interaction status and EndTurn state

      Parameters:
      game - current game object
      player - that ended his turn

    • gameUpdate

      public void gameUpdate​(Game game, boolean forced)
      Called on a generic game update

      Sends a packet with the game current status

      Parameters:
      game - current game object
      forced - if the updated is to be shown forcefully instead of relying on move packets

    • availableMovesUpdate

      public void availableMovesUpdate​(Player player, java.util.List<Point> validMoves, java.util.Map<Power,​java.util.List<Point>> blockedMoves)
      Called when new moves are available to the current player in his turn

      Sends a packet with the available moves

      Parameters:
      player - current turn player
      validMoves - list of the valid selectable squares
      blockedMoves - map with blocked squares associated with the power that is blocking them

    • requestToPlayer

      public void requestToPlayer​(Player player, EnumRequestType requestType)
      Called when the games requests input from the player

      Sends a packet with the request

      Parameters:
      player - that needs to be prompted a request
      requestType - type of request

    • sendPowerList

      public void sendPowerList​(java.util.List<Power> availablePowers, int toSelect)
      Called when a player needs to be given a list of god powers to choose from (used both for selecting all powers for the game or own personal power)

      Sends a packet with the god powers list

      Parameters:
      availablePowers - list with the god powers to show to the player
      toSelect - how many powers to select
